unnormalised: The price of tomatoes has skyrocketed to â‚¹120/kg in Mumbai's Dadar market! Traders are blaming unseasonal rains for the supply disruption. Seems like making tomato chutney is gonna cost a bomb now.
normalised: The price of tomatoes has skyrocketed to rupee one hundred and twenty per kilogram in Mumbai's Dadar market! Traders are blaming unseasonal rains for the supply disruption. Seems like making tomato chutney is going to cost a bomb now.

unnormalised: Consumers are feeling the pinch with onions also selling at Rs. 60 a kilo. Middle-class families are definitely tightening their purse strings this month. Wonder if govt will step in to control prices soon.
normalised: Consumers are feeling the pinch with onions also selling at rupee sixty a kilogram. Middle-class families are definitely tightening their purse strings this month. Wonder if government will step in to control prices soon.

unnormalised: Experts predict that vegetable prices will remain high for the next 2-3 weeks. Better stock up on potatoes, folks! At least they're still at a reasonable Rs 20 per kg. Chai and aloo bonda anyone?
normalised: Experts predict that vegetable prices will remain high for the next two to three weeks. Better stock up on potatoes, folks! At least they are still at a reasonable rupee twenty per kilogram. Chai and aloo bonda anyone?
